resumeData.contentHtml:
I'm a software engineer based in Berlin. My professional programming background is mostly defined by the JVM eco-system, but I had the chance to work in more performance-critical areas with Rust in the recent time.

I consider my self a programming language enthusiast, however, I prefer languages with a static type system.

If you have further questions reach out to me on LinkedIn. I try to answer messages on a regular basis, though, it may take a while.

Technical Skills

Linux, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, GitHub Actions, etc.

Programming Languages Experience (years) Level
Java 10 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Rust 2 ⭐⭐⭐⭐

Professional Experience

Below are some notable tasks and achievements of my career listed:

Senior Software Engineer @ SAP
Jan 2022 - present

  • Acquisition of Signavio (My tasks remained similar to those at Signavio before the acquisition).

Working Student | Software Engineer @ Signavio
Aug 2018 - Jul 2020 - Dec 2021

  • Process Mining Service
    Contributing to a legacy Java-based process mining engine with great focus on performance, scalability, and responsiveness.
  • Process Mining Query Engine (Signal)
    Being a core contributor in designing and building a novel in-memory query engine for high performance data analytics in the domain of process mining. The engine was implemented in Rust for memory safety and utilizes Apache Arrow for cache-efficient memory access. After two years, the legacy engine was made obsolete by the new one.
  • Leading Technical Initiatives
    Driving the entire development lifecycle of bigger technical topics and new language features for the engine, such as new language features. Starting off with a concept phase which usually involved research, prototyping different solutions, and a feasibility and risk assessments. Proceeding with organizing a planning phase where the team discusses scope, risk, and maps out dependencies to other teams. Finally, supporting the development as the responsible person and managing stakeholder requests.
  • Operations
    Contributing to on-going improvements of practices in team processes and software development and take on responsibility via regular on-call duty.

Software Engineer | Working Student @ OPTIMAL SYSTEMS
Sep 2013 - Apr 2014 - Aug 2018

  • Backend Service Development
    Development of different backend services mainly written in Java using the Spring Boot stack or Tomcat.

  • Project Development
    Implementing custom services independently and in-team and in close cooperation with customers and partners. This included consulting services, communication, and presentation of results.

  • Microservice Infrastructure
    Contributing to the development and enhancement of the internal service infrastructure, building libraries and backend services, help designing core practices and principles for their development.

  • DropTarget DSL
    Maintaining the development of a custom scripting DSL (DropTargets) based on Apache Jelly.

  • Training
    Help kick-starting a new remote working team outside of Germany by interviewing potential hires, providing on-site trainings and consulting.

  • Operations
    Contributing to on-going improvements of software development and CI/CD within my team.

App Developer @ emotion touch GmbH
Jan 2013 - Aug 2013

  • Windows Client Apps
    Development of WPF and Windows Store apps using .NET technologies.

Apprentice @ DRV Bund
Sep 2010 - Aug 2013

  • Virtual IT Company
    Founding and managing a virtual company together with a small group of peers over the course of the entire program. We applied for fictional and real internal software projects with solution concepts and cost estimations to build competitive products. In this setting we competed against the other virtual companies managed by different students. Within our peer group we won the most projects and have been the most successful team overall. The projects were mostly realized in Java and .Net.

  • Multi-touch App
    Building a multi-touch app for the Microsoft Surface 1 which was used to visually inform about the apprenticeship at IT fairs and acquire new talents.

  • Tutoring
    Teaching more junior students the basics of C# and WPF.

Education

Computer Science (M.Sc.) @ Technische Universität Berlin
Apr 2017 - Oct 2021

  • Focus area: In-memory databases on modern hardware
  • Thesis: Modeling Memory Contention on GPUs

Applied Computer Science (B.Sc.) @ Hochschule für Technik und Wirtschaft Berlin
Apr 2014 - Mar 2017

  • Semester abroad (2016): Auckland University of Technology, New Zealand

Specialized Computer Scientist in Software Development @ Oberstufenzentrum Informations- und Medizintechnik
Sep 2010 -- Aug 2013

Abitur @ Werner-Seelenbinder-Schule
2009

  • Advanced focus: mathematics, sports (volleyball)

Projects

WikiPlag (2016)

Platform to analyse scientific papers for plagiarism based on Wikipedia articles. For the plagiarism detection we used an n-grams approach and a tf-idf algorithm on an Apache Spark and MongoDB cluster. GitHub project
